Title: XSS In page name
Description: SilverStripe is vulnerable to XSS via the page name. For instance, page name `"><svg/onload=alert(/xss/)>` will trigger an XSS alert.
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.4.4-rc1, all versions starting from 3.5.0-alpha0 before 3.5.2-rc1
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.4.4-rc1 before 3.5.0-alpha0, all versions starting from 3.5.2-rc1
